stimulus.p: The Industrial Revolution marked a major turning point in history. During the late 18th and early 19th centuries, new manufacturing processes transformed largely rural, agrarian societies in Europe and America into industrial and urban ones.

Goods that had once been painstakingly crafted by hand started to be produced in mass quantities by machines in factories. The boom in productivity and economic growth had profound effects on the structure of society.

itemBody.p: According to the passage, what was the main effect of the Industrial Revolution?

choiceInteraction.simpleChoice: It transformed rural societies into industrial ones
It reduced the use of machines in manufacturing
It had no effect on society
